definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The cristae of the mitochondria are arranged closely.
sentences.chinese: 線粒體內嵴排列緊密，呈板層狀。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 18 patients with SRMs were analyzed and summarized retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性總結分析18例蝶骨嵴腦膜瘤的臨牀資料。

sentences.english: These inward folds are called cristae.
sentences.chinese: 這些內部的褶皺叫做嵴。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the microsurgical technique in managing medial sphenoid ridge meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內側型蝶骨嵴腦膜瘤顯微手術技巧。

sentences.english: Proximal cords of entrance cord was terminal crest and pectinate muscle, and distal one was plexiform cords.
sentences.chinese: 門索遠側爲叢狀條索，近側爲界嵴和梳狀肌。

sentences.english: The smooth outer membrane encloses the periphery of the mitochondria and the inner membrane is enfolded to form the cristae.
sentences.chinese: 光滑的外膜包圍了線粒體膜外圍和內屬於包含形成嵴。

sentences.english: The arrangment of mitochondria was parallel to that of the myofibrils.
sentences.chinese: 線粒體含量豐富嵴密集，與肌原纖維基本呈平行。

sentences.english: CoQ10 is found in the cristae folds.
He has protruding superciliary ridges, which are the main features on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他的眉嵴向外突出，這是他臉上最大的特徵。

sentences.english: The transverse fibers began to appear in the middle and inferior segments of CT near epicardium.
sentences.chinese: 從界嵴的中部向下，近心外膜側，開始出現橫行纖維。

sentences.english: The perichondrium of the cartilage is only partially contiguous with the periosteum of the crests.
sentences.chinese: 軟骨膜與齶嵴的骨膜之間只是部分延續。

sentences.english: This model is a "mitochondrial" ridge-like structures extracted from the.
sentences.chinese: 這種模式是由“線粒體”嵴狀結構中提煉而來的。

sentences.english: The numbers of P cell had a tendency of increasing from crista terminalis to aurical.
sentences.chinese: 從界嵴至右心耳，P細胞有逐漸增多的傾向。

sentences.english: Fibrous ridges pose a prosthodontic challenge for the achievement of stable and retentive dental prostheses.
sentences.chinese: 纖維性牙槽嵴修復的固位和穩定性充滿挑戰。

sentences.english: The ridges of the dorsal and ventral longitudinal columns extend inward respectively.
sentences.chinese: 纖維鞘的背側縱柱和腹側縱柱分別向內伸出一個嵴。

sentences.english: It is unmistakable with its golden crest and rump and bright red body.
sentences.chinese: 它與黃金嵴和臀部和鮮紅的身體無誤。

definition: ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
